name: immutable-plugin-system
description: A minimalist strongly typed immutable plugin system for Node.js
author: Alexander Gladysh <agladysh@gmail.com>

scripts.build:docs: pnpm -s run build:docs:site && pnpm -s run build:docs:md
scripts.build: pnpm -s run build:tsc && pnpm -s run build:examples && pnpm -s run build:docs
scripts.clean: pnpm -s run clean:dist && pnpm -s run clean:ts && pnpm -s run clean:reports && pnpm -s run clean:docs
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules examples/**/node_modules && pnpm -s run clean
scripts.test:all: pnpm -s run test:tsd && pnpm -s run test:tap
scripts.test: pnpm -s run lint && pnpm -s run test:all
scripts.test:ci: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; export CI=true; pnpm -s run clean:all && pnpm -s install && pnpm -s test'
scripts.test:fix: pnpm -s run fix && pnpm -s run test:all
scripts.lint: pnpm -s run lint:tsc && pnpm -s run lint:eslint && pnpm -s run lint:prettier && pnpm -s run lint:markdownlint
scripts.fix: pnpm -s run fix:eslint && pnpm -s run fix:prettier && pnpm -s run fix:markdownlint
scripts.link: pnpm uninstall -g immutable-plugin-system || true && pnpm link --global "$(pwd)"
